Queries.AddDailyInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.daily (D_ID, D_Date, D_FPAmount, D_SPAmount, NotTaken, D_Data, TakenDate, D_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@D_ID, @D_Date, @D_FPAmount, @D_SPAmount, @NotTaken, @D_Data, @TakenDate, @D_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateDailyData: UPDATE ct_db.daily SET D_FPAmount = @D_FPAmount, D_SPAmount = @D_SPAmount, NotTaken = @NotTaken, D_Updt_Person = @D_Updt_Person WHERE D_ID = @D_ID;
Queries.DeleteDailyData: UPDATE ct_db.daily SET D_Data = @D_Data, TakenDate = @TakenDate, D_Del_Person = @D_Del_Person WHERE D_ID = @D_ID;
